description.displayText: Deoti is knowledgeable and efficient with the care of the elderly. She took care of my mom working long hours. She's reliable and prompt. She's very caring and professional. I would highly recommend her.
description.originalText: Deoti is knowledgeable and efficient with the care of the elderly. She took care of my mom working long hours. She's reliable and prompt. She's very caring and professional. I would highly recommend her.

description.displayText:
Deoti is reliable, responsible and hard working. She has had a good deal of experience working with physically dependent clients as well as those with cognitive disabilities. I hired her to work with an elderly friend who had dementia and never worried that Deoti wouldn't do her best to care for her. She was unfailingly thoughtful and tender in her interactions with my friend. Whenever I visited, the house was in tiptop shape and my friend,, who was bed-bound, was clean and comfortable. It should also be noted that she's a very good cook! Her lentil soup is outstanding.
If I ever need an aide, I hope I get one of Deoti's caliber.
